Interests

Apart from being a Full-stack Software Engineer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I like yoga, hiking and photography. Yoga and hiking keep me flexible and active, photography makes me creative and productive to practice focus and think out of the box.

When forced indoors, I am an aspiring baker and my kids love my food and dessert that I made for them. I also spend some of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
